changeSet.author: household-manager
changeSet.comment: Update utility_prices meter_type check constraint to ELECTRICITY and GAS
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE utility_prices DROP CONSTRAINT chk_utility_price_meter_type
ALTER TABLE utility_prices ADD CONSTRAINT chk_utility_price_meter_type CHECK (meter_type IN ('ELECTRICITY', 'GAS'))

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE utility_prices DROP CONSTRAINT chk_utility_price_meter_type
ALTER TABLE utility_prices ADD CONSTRAINT chk_utility_price_meter_type CHECK (meter_type IN ('ELECTRICITY', 'WATER'))
